Blog.post: Gue juga lagi bingung buat mbayar wahyu,termin telat, gimana nih? dia kayanya ga bisa diajak kompromi, meski dulu pas dia kerjain tuh penulangan , telat dan sembrono. Dan yang pasti, boroosssssss banget. so aku harus redesain biar harga jualnya ke TVRI kompetitif Gambar pun belum dia buat. aku jadi males! aku telpon dia, ga diangkat. ya udah deh mending malem ini aku tidur ajah (kalo bisa sih) soalnya dah 3 minggu ini aku selalu baru bisa tidur jam 6 pagi. ga bisa ngapa-ngapain. ngetik skripsi??? wahhhhhh tangan nih berat banget kalo buat ngetik itu SIAL!!!!! Salam Hangat dari Ndalem Gowelan

Aku ingin kekasihku rembulan indah lembut bersinar dan tetap bersinar kala aku malas keluar menyambutnya Aku ingin Kekasihku Matahari Panas , terik, Menyengat namun menuntunku lalui hari Aku ingin Kekasihku Gempa mampu meremukkan masa lalu untuk membangun masa depan Tegongan, 04 Nopember 2001

Kekasihku, maafkan aku aku takkan pernah memberimu mawar karena mawar itu kan layu tak sebagaiman kasihku padamu yang takkan pernah layu Kekasihku, Maafkan aku aku takkan pernah memberimu mawar karena aku belum mapu menghapus durinya hingga tak melukai indah jarimu Kekasihku, Maafkan aku takkan pernah memberimu mawar GMG 485, 05 Juli 2001

Pak Guru Pak Guru, Hari ini aku lulus maaf kan nakalku Mohon Doa restu aku janji aku takkan nakal lagi Aku hanya akan........... MACAM-MACAM!!!!! SMA 1 Wonosari, 6 Juni 1998 Salam Hangat dari Ndalem Gowelan

ayoo dong, kalian isi comment. meski ini masih main2 script masih manut blogspot ga bisa kasih pic lom dapet curian space di server aku lupa ma root-nya ntar ah kalo dah dapet kan lumayan, biar ada gambar yang nempel, dan aku bisa buat script dewe lumayan kan hehehehe Wul........ kok kamu Kejam ma aku...aku bisa nangis loh Salam Hangat dari Ndalem Gowelan

as the air gets cold, the sky puts its dark layer over the night sky the wind blow freezing everything it passes by, even the star canât reach out my heart to give its warmth the moon is hiding away beneath the dark clouds, makes this solitude singing its melody on loneliness so gracefully i sit, and i look up to the black sky searching searching and searchingâ¦ oh, there u areâ¦ ur face printed so perfectly among the silence sky, just like the da vinci who just painted it thereâ¦ every details of ur face are created so bold, even in the darknessâ¦ i scan every single inches of itâ¦ then i get to the part of ur eyesâ¦ it feels like dejavuâ¦ when did i see those stares before? i try to open the door of my memories and let my self get carried away by the tides of my pastâ¦ and i stopâ¦ i stop on one day in the early of this 365 days i look aroun, and there am i, in ur room, in a city where u struggle with ur destinyâ¦ and i can see myself but iâm not alone u are there, lying beside me not a word spoken but the voice of our hearts represent everything we just keep silence, letting our souls get bond and i see myself staring ur faceâ¦ ur eyesâ¦ now i remember that look! itâs the most sacred and the most beautiful stare that i ever seeâ¦ ur eyes singing the most beautiful simphony than any mozart can makeâ¦ the look that not any brainwasher can erase it from my mindâ¦ ur eyes keep staring and staring at me without pause i see the beauty of love there i recognize the anxiety of being separated in it those eyes keep telling me âoh, if only times could stop right nowâ those eyes keep whispering to me âoh, if only we donât have to go through this good bye againâ those eyes keep saying to me another 1001 impossible wish that we wish thatâs not impossible if only stares can lock me inside, maybe i wonât ever get out from thereâ¦ iâd sing a praise as i enter my cell thereâ¦ but as the force of destiny is always much too strong, he ripped me away from ur side againâ¦ but itâs not strong enough to erase my memory of those beautiful stareâ¦ no matter where destinyâs taking me, it canât separate me with those stareâ¦ the glance that always reminds me of how beautiful the love that we have the glance that always makes me feel that i have u inside my soul the glance that always reminds me that ur heart is within me and always be there, waiting for its body to come again, when the destiny finally put its kindness to us, letting our body and heart side by side, telling the universe our story of loveâ¦ Salam Hangat dari Ndalem Gowelan

Semakin kamu genggam kuat2 pasir yang ada di tangan kamu,semakin banyak yang akan keluar/lepas dari genggaman mu.Tapi klo kamu genggam pasir itu dengan lembut,maka tidak akan ada yang keluar/lepas dari tangan mu :) Salam Hangat dari Ndalem Gowelan
